original_definition: 'Hazardous waste' means any waste which is covered by Article 1(4) of Council Directive 91/689/EEC of 12 December 1991 on hazardous waste (21);
generated_definition: 'Hazardous waste' means materials or substances which, due to their toxicity, corrosivity, ignitiveness, reactivity, or other properties, may cause harm to human health or the environment if not handled, stored, or disposed of properly.

Article 2: ‘Hazardous waste’ means any waste which is covered by Article 1(4) of Council Directive 91/689/EEC of 12 December 1991 on hazardous waste (21);
